attributes.action: Replace Council Tax with a Local Income Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the size of your house may have no relationship to your income and the perceived value of your house is open to the whim of government and the market, surely the fairest form of mandatory taxation is to relate it to your income and ability to pay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
